text: <@U02E3CRMA>: let's discuss I have one question and one idea
took a first pass at getting text into the Wiki: <https://github.com/UncorkedStudios/aperture/wiki>
once we have a few default models to work with, let's go back through and revise with a proper tutorial and make this page a quick-start guide
thnaks <@U02E3CRMA>.  should i create a UCS git account?

<@U02E3CRMA> i got access to wiki.  cool, saw what’s in there of the wiki. Thinking for v1.0 we want to include:
- Add a punchy intro statement before diving into set up instructions.  
- Overview of hardware needs 
- Peter’s notes RE work flow and process
- A high level allusion to roadmap
- Note about contributing code (one we have license stuff guided out)
also need to add license text to the repo
